sentence.text: But please , Mama , Lucinda pleaded silently , do n't treat me like a complete idiot .
` Oh , do tell us , " pleaded Wendy Witherington .
` Oh , please do n't tell him , " pleaded Perdita .
The caller from the agency may plead and cajole you into agreeing to accept the job , especially if it is a last minute booking and they are desperate for someone .
She had pleaded , cajoled and quarrelled violently as she tried to win the Prince 's assistance .
` Tell me what 's going on between you and Piers , " she heard herself pleading as she walked beside her .
Bernard Crick , in double harness with David Blunkett , pleaded for ` far more spontaneous sociability and helpfulness to neighbours and strangers -- fraternity . "
One respondent was not alone in pleading for ` a properly funded and functioning court system and properly paid legal aid " .
I have n't forgotten it was the Americans who refused to help when the people of East Berlin rose up and pleaded for freedom in 1953 .
In desperation his devoted parents wrote pleading for help to the Scottish Council of Spastics in Edinburgh after finding their address in a book back home .
Hoarse but buoyant , Clinton had roared towards the end of a marathon tour of eight states yesterday pleading for every last vote .
She found herself pleading on his behalf .
` Let me go , Fernando , " she pleaded in a half-whisper .
If not then I 'll plead to my wife for the car & I 'll be able to offer other people a lift there ( but I 'll be coming back on Sunday ) .
John Major should plead with George Bush not too let the C I A start it 's own secret foreign policy deals .
He strolled across to the games room , while she pleaded silently with him to hurry up before mummy found her .
Jairus pleaded with Jesus to cure his twelve-year-old daughter who was at home , dying .
` Dad ! " he pleaded .
` Please , Constance , " Nicky pleaded .
He then staggered uphill to a courting couple and pleaded : ` Help me , I think they have murdered my girlfriend and burned her alive . "
In vain Auguste pleaded that the Prince of Wales would not wait until September .
People were coming over to us out of shops , pleading to be included in my trials .
He pushed his muzzle into her lap , wagging his rump , pleading to be let out .
On learning of her mother 's decision , Anne pleaded to go with her .
Brother Rida , I plead to you through this article to understand the views of others , just like we try to understand the views of those who went astray .
